Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Alexis de Tocqueville wrote the statement "America is great because she is good" in his book "Democracy in America."
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the attribution of the quote to Alexis de Tocqueville.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the quote is an accurate representation of Alexis de Tocqueville's views, without providing concrete evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the quote was misattributed to Alexis de Tocqueville and does not actually belong to him.
